commitMessage.message: New features: theme search bar. Themes favorite button. List of favorite themes is cached, favorite themes list doesn't have a user-facing purpose yet.

Misc: Working on caching stylesheets and scripts for faster load times. Added previewTheme and currentTheme link tags, so we always have current theme loaded, and previewing loads a preview theme on TOP of that theme. This stops the site from having no theme loaded when previewing themes quickly. New toast message for favoriting themes. Moved toast message code to utilities script. Added a service worker to cache assets and improve load times.
Bugs: Fixed several data entry and caching bugs.
Full revamp of stylesheets on buttons, table, and menus for better contrast and more simplicity
Increased Number of rows in large jira entry.
Update styling for themes for better contrast on buttons, table, cells. Update the table borders, cells, header styles. Updated button styles and active/hover/focus states.
Bugs: Fixed the modal causing scroll bars to appear/dissapear and adjusting the position of elements. Fixed the stylesheet loading bug for switching themes.
Switched to custom table class inherited from BS. Allows table to be customized with themes.

Added themes from monkeytype.com (3 GPL License). Auto-generate HTML list of themes based off of _list.json in /themes/. Updated switching themes and theme event listeners. Cache the selected theme for next visit.
Removed update section from information modal, as it's all in changelog. Updated important info in information modal.
Better error handling for dynamic function calls.

New check for the changelog, if it's already been loaded, don't make additional requets. Updated how changelog is displayed in changelog modal. Fixed bug with changelog modal hiding scrollbar. Verions are now displayed with periods, for better clarity.
General cleanup to make different themes look better, like FAB button SVG's now use text-color.
Bugs: Fixed the modal causing scroll bars to appear/dissapear and adjusting the position of elements. Fixed the stylesheet loading bug for switching themes.
New modals, delete table confirm, developer error, and changelog
Replaced individual button listeners with a universal button listener for every tag with a data-st-action attribute. The action fires the corresponding function.
New delete table button in action tray. Also updates the users cache with the newly emptied array.
Added caching. The array used to store the time tracking data is stored in browser storage. Future updated will limit the lifetime of the storage of this data to 48 hrs.
Added changelog and version number to info modal.
Added git svg. Added developer error logging functions.
Added IDs to all buttons and svgs for logging.
Added hidden netlify form to aid in reporting errors.
Added prompt to confirm if a user wants to share error logs with the developer.
Updated information modal styles to use viewport units (vh) instead of rem.
Added links to badges.
Added a JSON file that contains all the version notes (this).
Fixed bugs: delete the header row, row counter decreases past 0, using correct changelog URL
Updated information modal to use card layout.
Added more info and updates to info modal. Adjusted clock to showClick=true on init.
Adusted styles for sizing the info modal card.
Removed margins on action tray.
Moved from gitlabs to github.
Added space below table so action tray doesn't overlap.
Added dev_badge.svg, github_badge.svg.
Added netlify status badge to information page. Added dev and github badges to information page.
Added link to mb-block library for markdown.
Added mini fab button to fab div, along with mini fab classes. Updated FAB menu to show/hide mini fab button
Updated toggleHoursColumns to use hide and show functions
Added palette svg file and used on mini fab button for themes. Trigger theme modal with mini fab button
Change theme on hover on list items from the list of themes. Updated change theme triggers to dynamically grab te theme file name
Added previewTheme function to add/remove stylesheets on hover. Updated changeTheme.
Added gear SVG file. Added default theme stylesheet. Added mini fab button for settings menu. Added event listener for settings menu.
Updated automatic new row event listener to fire for task time as well.
Moved toast message to left so it doesn't overlap with FAB buttons.
Made copy event fire when any part of button is clicked, not just SVG, also finds the text to copy more efficently
Updated sloth SVG to use currently color to fill, allows easier color changing. And removed object tag, placed full SVG there instead
Turned on FAB button, completed styling
Added download and three dots svg, changed FAB button to three dots
Fixed clipboard copy, had swapped DOM element structure
Added toast messages for copied to clipboard
Removed copied pop-up badge
Added Atom theme button for testing, added change theme function
Added toast init code and changed theme button to event listener
New branch in keyboard event listener for copy button
Updated to copyToClipboard function, case switch for event source
Removed console log and bad function call
Added copy to clipboard function, button, svg, and badge for the notification
Updated export to an additional format, comma delimited rows
New event listener for all clicks ont het atble to fire copy function
Additional classes and styles for copy to clipboard button
Start FAB buttons, currenly hidden
Updated controls area to align to top
Updated styles to remove scroll bar on table for desktop
Moved modal setup to it's own function
Modal shortcut no calls setupModal
Fixed large jira entry button, opens on last edited row
Updated export to inlcude total hours
updated export to calcluate total hours
Added start and end time to total hours toggle
Added total hours column to table
Added toggle function to hide/show total hours/start/end time columns
Initial merge from private repo
